wikitext.*:
{{year-header}}
==March==
* '''[[6 March|6]]''' - [[Christina Scull]]  is born.
* '''[[15 March|15]]''' - [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] writes [[Letter to John Kettle|a letter to John Kettle]].

==November==
* '''[[24 November|24]]''' - Actor [[Billy Connolly]] is born.
==December==
* '''[[7 December|7]]''' - [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] writes [[letter 47]].
==?==
* '''? ''' - ''[[A Philological Miscellany Presented to Eilert Ekwall]]'', containing an introductory note co-signed by [[J.R.R. Tolkien]], is published.
* '''?''' - Author [[Stanley P. Baldwin]] is born.
==Note==
While writing ''[[The Lord of the Rings]]'', Tolkien modelled the [[moon|lunar]] phases of {{TA|3019}} on those of this year, with an offset of +5/6 days.<ref>{{HM|RC}}, p. xlvi</ref>
